text.script: if (itemSize>16){showstr="【快进键】跳转至最后一集,【数字键】跳转至相应集数";}else {showstr="";}showstr;

if (sfyxb==1){if(Record_n > 1){if(Record_m > 1){Recordplay="上次看到：第"+ Record_n +"集,第"+Record_m+"段,"+secondToString(Record_start);}else{Recordplay="上次看到：第"+ Record_n +"集,"+secondToString(Record_start);}}else{Recordplay="上次看到："+secondToString(Record_start);}}Recordplay;
